name: set_locale
description: A cookbook to set locales (default to en_US-UTF8) to enable using UTF8 databases with PostgreSQL server
long_description: Updates the locales by setting LANGUAGE, LANG and LC_ALL environment variables, generating locales with locale-gen and running dpkg-reconfigure

locale.description: The locale value used to set LANGUAGE, LANG and LC_ALL.

recipes.default: Default recipe performing the locales setup
